data.title: Competitive Advantages Of Ge Health Care - 1800 Words

data.text:
Competitive advantages

• GE health care is now expanding their footprint in emerging markets like Asia and Pacific.

• GE health care has now established their manufacturing bases in the regions like India and China, where the capital investment is low.

• To be a step ahead of their competitors in molecular imaging, computed tomography and ultrasound GE healthcare has invested a fancy sum in the technology research and development.

• Relevant tools and techniques for each environment like quality challenge in UK and access to the challenges faced by GE health care in china.

• GE health care is seeking a step ahead in today’s healthcare challenges like portable ECG, asset management and low cost ultrasound technologies.

• GE health care is developing products with clinical & economic relevance to have a competitive lead in every segment of the product.

• GE had huge investments to support digitizing the health care like imaging pathology.

• GE health care had already made their mark with some smart innovation like producing Vscan.

• GE health care has a broad Product portfolio when compared to the other competitors.

• With their huge investments in research made them superior in technology.

GE healthcare has a market share of 29% in the world market.

Competitors

 Siemens Health Care

Siemens Health Care is the largest healthcare tools provider in the world market. They were also the true believers of the technology and have huge investments in the research for the further
